elements.content: II48(a) The coordination environments of Zn(II) ions in 3 and symmetry codes: A = −x + 1, y − 1/2, −z + 1/2; B = −x + 2, y − 1/2, −z + 1/2; (b) the 2D wave-like layers down the c axis and the Zn2(μ2-COO)3(μ1-COO)1 SBU, the 2,2′-dpy ligand; the nitro groups and hydrogen atoms are omitted for clarity; (c) the 3D “brick-wall” framework with two rectangular channels (A and B) down the a axis; the sectional 2,2′-dpy ligand, the nitro groups and hydrogen atoms are omitted for clarity; (d) a topological representation of the 3D “brick-wall” structure, which is a (4)-connected net (the yellow-balls represent the nbtc4− ligands and the light-blue balls represent Zn2(μ2-COO)3(μ1-COO)1 SBUs).
